meanings.definition: To surpass in organizing or planning.
meanings.sent1: She managed to outorganize her classmates in planning the school event.
meanings.sent2: The team was able to outorganize their opponents and secure the victory.
meanings.sent3: Despite his messy room, he always somehow outorganizes everyone at work.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outorganize chaos was like a beacon of light in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The way she could outorganize any situation was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To be more successful in organizing than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He always tries to outorganize his siblings when it comes to planning family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The experienced project manager knew how to outorganize his team members to meet deadlines.
meanings.sent3: It's a friendly competition to see who can outorganize the other in tidying up the office.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outorganize her competitors was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The team's strategy to outorganize their opponents was flawless.
